projects.title: TED TRANSLATORS
projects.description: Since June 2021, I belong to the volunteering group of TED Translators. My job mainly consists in producing the Spanish translation for TED Talkâ€™s subtitles.

projects.title: CLINA
projects.description: From January to July 2021, I made an internship as translator for CLINA, the USAL translation journal. During these six months, Iâ€™ve worked as a translator and as proofreader. Then, my job consisted in translating into Spanish academic articles related to translation studies, as well as in proofreading other different translations.
